java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<BuildScope>
public enum BuildScope
extends Enum<BuildScope>

An enum that represents the different scopes that plugins apply to

Since:
1.1

Created: Dec 12, 2008

Author:
Graeme Rocher
